title: Value of the global eyewear market from 2018 to 2025
yAxis: Market value in billion U.S. dollars
summary: In general Market value in billion U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Market value in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2020 to 2025.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2024 and 2025.
The highest Market value in billion U.S. dollars, of value 210.87 was reached at Year 2025
The lowest Market value in billion U.S. dollars, of value 150.35 was reported at Year 2020
